sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the African-American HIV/AIDS Response Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the African-American HIV/AIDS Response Act.

sections.heading: Legislative finding.  The General Assembly finds
sections.text:
that HIV/AIDS in the African-American community is a crisis
separate and apart from the overall issue of HIV/AIDS in other
communities.

sections.heading: African-American HIV/AIDS Response Officer
sections.text: An African-American HIV/AIDS Response Officer, responsible for coordinating efforts to address the African-American AIDS crisis within his or her respective Office or Department and serving as a liaison to governmental and non-governmental entities beyond

sections.heading: Study. The Illinois HIV/AIDS Policy and Research Institute at Chicago State University shall conduct a study to determine whether there is a correlation between incarceration and HIV infection
sections.text: Study. The Illinois HIV/AIDS Policy and Research Institute at Chicago State University shall conduct a study to determine whether there is a correlation between incarceration and HIV infection.

sections.heading: Implementation subject to appropriation.
sections.text: Implementation of this Act is subject to appropriation.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2006.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2006.
